FuncDef:
The ifit command enables In-situ Flow Information Telemetry (iFIT) globally and displays the iFIT view.
The undo ifit command disables iFIT globally.
By default, iFIT is disabled globally.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
iFIT measures packet loss and delay on links. To enable iFIT globally, run the ifit command.
Precautions
Running the undo ifit command will delete all instances on the device.
